role.argrole: thing that exists to some extent with respect to arg0

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 这)) (VP (VP (VV 可能) (VP (VV 形成) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 某) (CLP (M 种))) (DNP (NP (NN 互动) (PU 、) (NN 伙伴)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 关系))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 甚至)) (VP (VV 有点) (NP-OBJ (CP-APP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 回到) (NP-OBJ (NN 部落) (NN 时代)))) (DEC 的)) (NP (NN 感觉)))))))
example.arg: *PRO* 回到 部落 时代 的 感觉
